feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Ignore 'dba' for labeling by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22216
  • fix: resolve race condition in ready-for-e2e label checking by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22222
  • fix: use triggering user's email/name in draft-release workflow by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22229
  • fix: Don't default to ROUND_ROBIN as user bookings don't have it set by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22210
  • fix: Avoid prerender duplicate calls for same calLink that could arise with faulty implementation by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21982
  • perf: optimize filterRedundantDateRanges from O(n²) to O(n log n) by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22093
  • chore: stringify user context ids apiv2 axiom by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22234
  • fix: add explicit type annotation to CalComAdapter function by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22230
  • chore: add sharp as depdency on apiv1 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22204
  • chore: add user org id to user context apiv2 axiom by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22236
  • fix: atoms local dev by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22240
  • fix: add formatPeriodFull method for different date formatting in insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22202
  • fix(ui): improve delete popup spacing on tablets and small screens by @manthansubhash01 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22042
  • fix: atoms local by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22245
  • feat: add Video Options dropdown with meeting session details by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22147
  • feat: Salesforce - write assignment reason to record by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22223
  • fix: Don't continue retrying SMS reminders infinitely by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22251

New Contributors

  • @manthansubhash01 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22042

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.12...v5.4.13

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • perf: optimize google's getAvailability with caching by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22191
  • perf: optimize date range intersection algorithm from O(n²) to O(n log n) by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22076
  • docs: improve English naturalness in API v2 documentation by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22130
  • fix: Duplicate calendar event when a guest is added by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22247
  • refactor: create team service by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22036
  • feat: Waiting room setting for Zoom by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22256
  • refactor: filter out admins and owners from platform event types hosts by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22258
  • feat: Add routing-forms record response endpoint with available slots by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22239
  • chore: fix key duplication in common.json by @apsinghdev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21975
  • fix: prevent footer from overlapping content in SearchDialog by @abhix4 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22266
  • fix: Workflow scanning by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22273
  • refactor: replace Prisma.validator

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: add createdAt field to SelectedCalendar and DestinationCalendar by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22071
  • feat: pbac core ui by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21471

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.14...v5.4.15

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: unit tests failing on destination calendar missing timestamps by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22292
  • refactor: make v2 docs consistent by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22299
  • fix: issue #9523 limited scroll range on mobile device by @fabiogaliano in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21935
  • fix: Changes to Managed Event Types Reset Assignee Availability by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21980
  • fix: sort the availabilities based on start time for each day by @BKM14 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21656
  • refactor: getAvailableSlots use repositories by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22290
  • fix: improve redirect parameter handling for success page by @guptadeepak8 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20764
  • fix: Unable to cancel a team event if any event host is an attendee by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22233
  • fix: Embed - Scroll to timeslots when user selects a date for the first time by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22313
  • fix: flakey v2 assign-all-team-members test by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22300
  • chore: added platform link to api key settings by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21807
  • feat: added option to lock maxactivebookingsperbooker for managed events by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21892
  • feat: add expandable submenu for sidebar by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22268
  • refactor: attendee scheduled email timezone by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22301
  • feat: Add Bengali Language Support. This fixes #17717 by @akashkinkarpandey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20567
  • fix: Improve perceived loading speed with default loader(reverts to previous behaviour) by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22323
  • fix: Update org user permissions for admins by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22332
  • refactor: GetAvailableSlotsService by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22321
  • revert: "refactor: GetAvailableSlotsService (#22321)" by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22334
  • fix: Hosts are able to cancel an event without providing any reason but with whitespace characters by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22282
  • fix: center align dropdown indicator when menu is open by @abhix4 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22262
  • fix: theme and password type in newUser seed data by @bandhan-majumder in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22232

New Contributors

  • @fabiogaliano made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21935
  • @BKM14 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21656
  • @guptadeepak8 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20764
  • @akashkinkarpandey made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20567
  • @bandhan-majumder made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.15...v5.4.16

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Self hosted onboarding by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22102
  • fix: allow enter key to create new list items in editor by @ddoemonn in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22001
  • refactor: get available slots service by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22340
  • feat: add race condition test for calendar-cache-serve booking flow by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22170
  • fix: Add unique constraint to team and slug for attributes by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22357
  • fix: manage Seo index for embed page by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22348
  • fix: Can't scroll down on the payment page by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22363
  • fix: 🐛 guests no show insights bug by @shaun-ak in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22045
  • chore: new auth strategy for third party access tokens by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21867
  • chore: DI repositories in AvailableSlotsService class by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22356

New Contributors

  • @shaun-ak made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22045

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.16...v5.4.17
